?:
Welcome to the template for ECMWF projects!

Please provide values to following template variables, in order to properly
prepare the template for you. In case you don't know the answer, you can just
leave the default value by pressing Enter.

Note that number of features are optional, you can activate them by answering
'y' when prompted.

Let's get started, press Enter to continue...

__prompts__.logo_path_light: Absolute path to the light logo (must be a png), skipped if not provided
__prompts__.logo_path_dark: Absolute path to the dark logo (must be a png), use light logo if not provided, unused if light logo not provided
